attributes.action: Cancel a level and GCSE 2021 exams
attributes.additional_details:
Students have missed 6 months of education to be expected to sit exams full of content they have had to teach themselves.
Due to the rapid rise In coronavirus cases thousands of parents and students are scared to attend education in case of catching the virus.
Students mental health has seriously suffered due to having to revise for exams when they have missed their whole first year and a half  of education for! 
We are asking for the government to give predicted or centre assessed grades!
attributes.background: Cancel all GCSE and a level exams in Britain due to the huge amounts of cases within the UK and cases and infection rates are higher than when exams were cancelled in March 2020

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Cancel GCSEs and A Levels in 2021
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066

Cancel GCSE and A-levels in 2021 replace with Course Work and Teacher Assessment
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564696
